"It felt funny playing against guys you played with all year," Allen Iverson said. You look left, you look right and there are guys that were always right there in the foxhole with you, who felt bad when you felt bad. It was tough. Allen Iverson , who scored 40 or more points for the 16th time this season, had 17 in the first quarter and 16 in the third. He made eight straight shots in one stretch and finished 16-of-30. The

, Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about a implant that could tell Google Inc. what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and that an implant would cross the line. was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her," she told British newspaper The Sun. He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop.
